title: Horror Granny
fullContent: Home› ActionHorror GrannyBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenDo you think you are brave enough to escape the Horror Granny ? Play to find out if you are fast enough to run from the eyes of the Granny.It is dark and the old woman has the demonic spirit that can make you a victim. The music will make the atmosphere more terrifying that will challenge your mind to find the exit way and run for your life. There are 4 levels ready to be completed. Don't be scared, be smart and escape from the Horror Granny.• Level 1,2,4 Objective: You are in room, you have to go outside the hospital without making any noise.• Level 3 Objective: You are in ward, you have to go outside the hospital without making any noise.Features:Multiple levelsChallenging gameplayControls:WASD to moveSpace bar to jumpLeft Shift to runThis article was updated on December 20, 20231 Player3DActionCrazyEscapeFreeHorrorSurvivalUnity
